text: @ArvindKejriwal Happy to see that Kejriwal is admiring Modi Ji .In this difficult time when world is suffering from Global COVID-19 pandemic than our leader is leading the world.Golden history is being written by indians,whole world will remember that how india saved Humanity #ArvindKejriwal
